item.title: nilo's queer art mentor application
item.description: [these essays were submitted as part of my application to the 2023 Queer|Art mentor program] 1. Which Mentor(s) are you interested in working with? For each Mentor listed, describe why you’d like to build a relationship with them specifically. I am interested in working with Stephen Winter. ‘Representation is vital to letting queer people understand that there’s a world beyond them’ (Winter, 2022). I tell our stories, and make work that reflects us.
